org.jclouds.openstack.nova.v2_0.features
Interface FlavorApi

public interface FlavorApi

Provides asynchronous access to Flavors via their REST API.

Author:
Jeremy Daggett, Ilja Bobkevic
See Also:
FlavorAsyncApi,
